text: Lois Ragnhild Grimsrud Capps (born January 10, 1938) was the U.S. Representative for , serving in Congress from 1998 to 2017. She is a member of the Democratic Party. Capps served on the U.S. House Committee on Energy and Commerce, where she was a member of the Energy and Air Quality Subcommittee and the Subcommittee on Health. She was a member of the New Democrat Coalition. ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from California Category:Politicians from Wisconsin Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Lois Capps
